first_para: Robert Henry Halfon (born 22 March 1969) is a British Conservative politician. He is the current Member of Parliament (MP) for Harlow, and was first elected at the 2010 general election.

full.extract:
Robert Henry Halfon (born 22 March 1969) is a British Conservative politician. He is the current Member of Parliament (MP) for Harlow, and was first elected at the 2010 general election.
^ "British Jews taking wait-and-see approach to unusual new coalition". Haaretz Newspaper (Israel). 13 May 2010. Retrieved 4 June 2010. 
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
^ "Election 2010: Harlow result". cityam.co.uk. Retrieved 7 May 2010.
full.title: Robert Halfon
